1.text: Decide whether or not to use pectin.

5.text: Prepare the fruit in a stock pot or large saucepan.

6.text: Bring the fruit mixture to a full rolling boil.

8.text: Let the fruit mixture simmer for 5-20 minutes until it reaches a thicker, syrupy consistency.

10.text: Use a spoon to skim any foam or bubbles off the top surface.

11.text: Ladle the jam or jelly into the prepared jars.

12.text: Prepare the seals of the jars.

13.text: Boil the jars with the jam in them for 10 minutes.

15.text: Make sure that the jars have sealed.
